name: Frank's Big Job
description:
You are Frank of Frank's Flivvers, a cake delivery company. Hard times have fallen upon you, and Fat Roland lends you some money, but by doing so he's bringing you on his payroll, so you've got to bootleg for him, and then pay him back $5,000.

Enjoy this fun, time management game where you race the clock in an attempt to pay back Fat Roland!

This game was made by @josefnpat for the August 2015 OneGameAMonth challenge.

This game was made with the experimental Unity 5.1.0f3 Linux release.

Release Log

v2 - September 2, 2015

  • Added full mouse look
